sections.heading: 4 through 23 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "Oklahoma Milk and Milk Products Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1981, c. 43, ยง 1, emerg. eff. April 8, 1981. Amended by Laws 1987, c. 206, ยง 17, operative July 1, 1987; Laws 1987, c. 236, ยง 3, emerg. eff. July 20, 1987; Laws 1994, c. 140, ยง 4, eff.
